meanings.definition: On the condition or understanding that
meanings.sent1: You can go outside, provided you wear your coat.
meanings.sent2: You can play with your toys, provided you clean them up afterward.
meanings.sent3: The cat will only come inside, provided you give it treats.
meanings.sent4: The car will start, provided you turn the key in the ignition.
meanings.sent5: You can have dessert, provided you finish your vegetables first.

meanings.definition: Supply with what is needed or required
meanings.sent1: She provided snacks for the party.
meanings.sent2: The teacher provided pencils for the students.
meanings.sent3: The kind neighbor provided help when the car broke down.
meanings.sent4: The store provided fresh produce for the customers.
meanings.sent5: The company provided training for the new employees.

meanings.sent1: The hotel provided towels for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant provided menus for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The library provided books for the community.
meanings.sent4: The school provided laptops for the students.
meanings.sent5: The hospital provided care for the patients.
